value.body: Mission Hill (1999 - assistant director, storyboard artist)
value.text: Mission Hill (1999 - assistant director, storyboard artist)

paragraphs.body: Filoni grew up in Mt. Lebanon, a suburb near Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and graduated from Mt. Lebanon High School in 1992. He was in the marching band at school and was also the starting goaltender for half of his senior year on the hockey team. He attended Edinboro University of Pennsylvania.
paragraphs.text: Filoni grew up in Mt. Lebanon, a suburb near Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and graduated from Mt. Lebanon High School in 1992. He was in the marching band at school and was also the starting goaltender for half of his senior year on the hockey team. He attended Edinboro University of Pennsylvania.

paragraphs.body: Filoni plays World of Warcraft, in which he is a level eighty Night Elf Hunter, and ice hockey. He is an unofficial Dúnedain, and a fan of both Godzilla and the Pittsburgh Steelers.
